text: Food is great....not sure how Yelp has this in Scottsdale?  I added this business as being in Spanish Wells, Eleuthera Bahamas. Doed Yelp not work outside the US?  This is my first attempt to use Yelp outside of the US.   O well

One of the few places that accepts credit cards on the island (Eleuthera, not Arizona). I have to say I regretted not getting the prime rib special on valentine's day. This does appear to be the most 'fancy' of the restaurants in SW and we had good servers. But the food was just alright. I can't say that there was any dish that was particularly memorable.
Not in Arizona. Restaurant is in Spanish Wells ( Eleuthera, Bahamas). Excellent food in a very unique island.
